data.text: You catch your breath and try to still your shaking hands. Nearby, the bodies of those nameless things melt away, rapidly disappearing into the sand as rivers of pitch-dark liquid. You did it.
... But with such power, you hardly even need to ASCEND. To be able to defy the pursuing horrors before even stepping onto the train means you already possess a strength to rival demigods.
Unfortunately, you probably cheated to do this, so it hardly means anything. Maybe try boarding the train next time.
